summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements. A new LaunchRoadmap component was created (not modifying existing Roadmap.tsx), integrated into the homepage with a prominent launch button displaying March 31st, and includes a clickable modal revealing detailed launch phases. The implementation uses consistent theming, animations (useInView hook), and responsive design matching the wolf/pack aesthetic.

hallucinated_features.description: Phase 2 in LaunchModal includes detailed descriptive text about Tier 1 exchange listings and market expansion that goes beyond the requested information
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 requested 'Tier 1 Exchange Launch milestone approximately 3 months after soft launch (around end of June)' but the modal includes additional marketing copy about 'major exchange partnerships' and 'enhanced trading capabilities' that were not specified in the BuildRequest

hallucinated_features.description: Escape key handler and body overflow management in LaunchModal
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not specify keyboard interaction or scroll-lock behavior for the modal; these are implementation details beyond the requested functionality

hallucinated_features.description: Shimmer animation effect on the Launch button
hallucinated_features.reason: While an 'eye-catching design' was requested, the specific shimmer/gradient animation was not specified in the BuildRequest
